record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2750
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2750 -- (House of Representatives - July 23, 2007)

[Page: H8256]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 2750, the NASA and JPL 50th Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Indiana?
